abstract.t: This document describes extensions to MPLS signaling required tosupport Generalized MPLS. Generalized MPLS extends MPLS to encompasstime-division (e.g. SONET ADMs), wavelength (optical lambdas) andspatial switching (e.g. incoming port or fiber to outgoing port orfiber). This document presents a functional description of theextensions. Protocol specific formats and mechanisms are currentlyincluded in this draft but are expected to be split out intoseparate, per protocol documents.
